price: 8. En Wij hebben hen niet geschapen met lichamen die niet aten noch waren zij onsterfelijk.
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَسَدٗا لَّا يَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُواْ خَٰلِدِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalnāhum jasadan lā yakulūna al-ṭaʿāma wamā kānū khālidīna
